name: test_e2e_with_logs[046_SQLI_ERROR_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_008` |
| **Name** | MySQL GTID_SUBSET error injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND GTID_SUBSET(version(),1) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20GTID_SUBSET%28version%28%29%2C1%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:16.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XPath Injection] XPath injection attempt test_id=SQLI_ERROR_008-1767842056436-axbwwg pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_008 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20GTID_SUBSET%28version%28%29%2C1%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1
